definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
to eat sb's flesh and sleep on their hide (idiom); to swear revenge on sb/implacable hatred/to have sb's guts for garters

lit. "Why don't they eat meat?" (said by Emperor Hui of Jin 晉惠帝|晋惠帝[Jin4 Hui4 di4] when told that his people didn't have enough rice to eat)/fig. (of people from higher class etc) to be oblivious to other people's plight
Carnivora, order of carnivores within Mammalia

sentences.english: Small catlike predatory mammals of warmer parts of the Old World.
sentences.chinese: 东半球温暖地区的象猫的小型食肉哺乳动物。

sentences.english: In zoology, the giant panda is Carnivora.
sentences.chinese: 在动物学上，大熊猫属食肉目。

sentences.english: Predatorsx were a threat to the herd.
sentences.chinese: 食肉动物对牧群是个威胁。

sentences.english: Then the grass-eating animals died of hunger.
sentences.chinese: 然后食肉动物死于饥饿。

sentences.english: The meat-eater's desire for meat drives another to kill and provide that meat.
sentences.chinese: 食肉的欲望导致了他人的杀生以提供肉食。

sentences.english: Bulldogs were also used for protection against other carnivorous wild animals.
sentences.chinese: 斗牛狗也用于保护人们免遭其他食肉动物的伤害。

sentences.english: The mosquito knows full well, small as he is he's a beast of prey.
sentences.chinese: 蚊虫知道得很清楚，他虽然小却是一个食肉兽。

sentences.english: Any of various predatory birds of the hawk family Accipitridae, having a long, often forked tail and long pointed wings.
sentences.chinese: 属于鹰科的各种食肉的鸟之一，有长的，经常为。

sentences.english: Lions and tigers are flesh-eating animals.
sentences.chinese: 狮子和老虎是食肉动物。

sentences.english: BARBARA KLEIN: Piranhas are known as dangerous, meat-eating fish.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，食人鱼是一种危险的食肉鱼。

sentences.english: The agency kills foxes, badgers and other predators.
sentences.chinese: 他们杀死狐狸，獾和其他食肉动物。

sentences.english: Camels are mainly used for transport, but they are sometimeesmilked or killed for meat.
sentences.chinese: 骆驼主要用于运输，但有时也会用于产奶和食肉。

sentences.english: It is exclusively carnivorous and it is undoubtedly the King of the African Sport Fish on the continent.
sentences.chinese: 这完全是食肉，它无疑是非洲体育王鱼的大陆。

sentences.english: Especially large, sharp canine characterizes the carnivorous animals.
sentences.chinese: 大而尖利的犬齿是食肉动物的特征。

sentences.english: For best results, meat should be medium-rare.
sentences.chinese: 最好的结果就是，适当的食肉。

sentences.english: A lot of people wonder how zombie parents raise such stereotypically ravenous kids.
sentences.chinese: 很多人好奇僵尸父母培养出的孩子怎么总是食肉成性。

definition: man-eating (beast)/to eat people/fig. to oppress the people
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
to prey on/to catch and feed on/to hunt for food
